name: 真乃
text:
ごめんね
ちょっと遅くなっちゃった
trans:
Sorry...
We ended up arriving a little late...

name: 灯織
text: めぐる、待たせちゃってごめん
trans: Sorry to keep you waiting, Meguru.

name: めぐる
text:
わぁ……！
ふたりとも似合ってるよー！
trans:
Wow...!
The clothes match you two so well!

name: 真乃
text: そ、そうかな……
trans: I-Is that so...

name: めぐる
text:
うん！　みんなでおそろいの制服なんて
おんなじ学校に通ってるみたい
trans:
Yep! Our matching school uniforms really
make it feel like we go to the same school, too!

name: めぐる
text:
後で写真撮りたいなぁ
ね、どうかなっ？　記念に記念にっ
trans:
Maybe I'll want to take a picture later～
How does that sound? In memory of today!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわ、うん
一緒に撮ろうねっ
trans:
Howa... Yep!
Let's take one later!

name: 灯織
text: まぁ、確かにこんな機会はなかなかないしね
trans:
Well, it is true that this kind of opportunity
doesn't come around often.

name: めぐる
text: わーい！
trans: Yaaay!

name: 灯織
text: でも、めぐる……
trans: Though, Meguru...

name: 灯織
text: いきなり『プール！』ってなんのことかと思った
trans:
What were you trying to do,
shouting "It's a pool!" out of nowhere like that?

name: めぐる
text: えへへ……ごめんね
trans: Ehehe... my bad.

name: めぐる
text:
プロデューサーに先に教えてもらっちゃったからさ、
すぐふたりにも伝えたくてっ
trans:
Producer went ahead and told me about it first,
and I wanted to tell you guys about it so badly...

name: 灯織
text:
嬉しいのはわかるけど
撮影場所だっていう情報も大事でしょ
trans:
I get that you were happy, but it would've been
useful if you told us the actual location too.

name: めぐる
text: うん、気をつける！
trans: Yeah, I'll be careful next time!

name: 真乃
text:
ふふ……
撮影、もうじき始まるね。ドキドキするなぁ
trans:
Fufu... The photo shoot will start soon, right?
I'm getting excited.

name: 灯織
text:
プール掃除のイメージだって話だけど
どんなふうに撮影するんだろう
trans:
They said the photo shoot would be themed "pool
cleaning", but I wonder how exactly we'll do that.

name: めぐる
text:
小道具にブラシとか使うんだって
本当に掃除してるみたいにすればいいのかなー？
trans:
Apparently we'll have scrubbing props and stuff.
I wonder if they want it to look like we're actually
cleaning.

name: 真乃
text:
ほわ、プールのお掃除ってやったことないから、
ちゃんとできるかな……
trans:
Howa... I've never cleaned a pool before, I wonder
if I'll be able to do it...

name: めぐる
text: 大丈夫だよ、真乃！
trans: Don't worry, Mano!

name: めぐる
text:
とにかくブラシでごしごしーってして
ホースで水をばしゃーってすればいいんだもん！
trans:
You just have to *scrub scrub* with the brushes,
*splaaash* all over the place with the hose,
and you'll be perfect!

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そうだよねっ……
とりあえず頑張ってみる……むんっ
trans:
Y-You're right...
I'll just do what I can for now... Mun!

name: 灯織
text: ふたりとも、雑誌の撮影だってことも忘れないようにね
trans:
You two... Don't forget that we're here
to shoot for a magazine entry, okay?

name: 真乃
text: あ、そっか……
trans: Ah, right...

name: めぐる
text: あはは！　ほんとだね！
trans: Ahaha! That's true!

name: 灯織
text: もう……
trans: Geez...

name: 真乃
text:
（ふぅ……緊張したけど、
なんとか撮影もうまくいって良かった……）
trans:
(Phew... I was a bit nervous,
but I'm glad the photo shoot went well...)

name: 真乃
text: ほわぁ……風が気持ちいいなぁ……
trans: Howa... The wind feels so good...

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんと、めぐるちゃん
まだプールの方にいるのかな？）
trans:
(Are Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan
still in the pool, perhaps?)

name: 灯織
text: あっ、めぐる足元にホースが──
trans: Ah! Meguru, don't step on the hose──

name: めぐる
text: え？
trans: Huh?

name: 灯織
text: きゃあ……！
trans: Eek...!

name: めぐる
text: わあっ、灯織！！　ごめんねっ、大丈夫！？
trans: Aah! Hiori!! My bad, are you okay!?

name: 真乃
text:
（ふたりの声……？
どうかしたのかな？）
trans:
(Is that their voices...?
I wonder if something happened?)

name: 灯織
text: ……お返しっ！
trans: ...This is payback!

name: めぐる
text:
わぁ！
ひ、灯織、ごめんってば……！
trans:
Wah!
H-Hiori, I said I was sorry...!

name: 灯織
text: ダメ！　めぐるも濡れるまで許さないから
trans:
Nope!
I won't forgive you until you're nice and wet too!

name: めぐる
text:
わっ！
……えへへ、当たらないよっ
trans:
Wah!
Ehehe, you can't hit me!

name: 真乃
text: （私も行ってみよう）
trans: (Maybe I should go join them...)

name: 真乃
text: ふたりとも、どうかし──
trans: Did something happen, you two──

name: 真乃
text: わっ……！
trans: Wah...!

name: 灯織
text:
ま、真乃……！？
ごめん！　大丈夫だった……？
trans:
M-Mano...!?
Sorry! Are you okay...?

name: 真乃
text:
あ……うん
平気だよっ
trans:
Ah... Yep.
I'm fine.

name: 灯織
text: 良かった……
trans: That's a relief...

name: 真乃
text:
（ふたりとも、水のかけあいっこしてたんだ
私も濡れちゃったけど……楽しそうだな）
trans:
(So they were having a water fight with each
other... Although, I got wet too... But it looks fun.)

name: 真乃
text: （あっそうだ──）
trans: (Ah, I know──)

name: 真乃
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 灯織
text: 真乃……？
trans: Mano...?

name: 真乃
text: 灯織ちゃん、ごめんねっ
trans: Hiori-chan, I'm sorry!

name: 真乃
text: ──えいっ
trans: ──Ei!

name: 灯織
text: きゃっ……！
trans: Wah...!

name: 真乃
text: えへへ、私からもお返しっ
trans: Ehehe, that was my payback!

name: めぐる
text: 真乃が反撃した！？
trans: Mano has retaliated!?

name: 真乃
text:
ごめんね
ふたりが楽しそうだったから、つい
trans:
I'm sorry... It seemed like you two were having so
much fun, so I wanted to join in...

name: 灯織
text:
まさか真乃にもやられるとは思わなかった
……でも、楽しい
trans:
I never imagined that you of all people would that...
But, this is fun...!

name: めぐる
text:
あっ、灯織ばっかりずるいよー！
真乃、わたしとも水遊びしよ？　かけてかけて！
trans:
Hey, not fair! You're only targeting Hiori～!
I'm here too, you know? Bring it on, bring it on!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ？
お、お願いされるのは、ちょっと変な感じ……
trans:
Howa?
I-It's a little weird hearing someone ask for it...

name: めぐる
text:
ふっふー、だってわたし、簡単には濡れないもん！
ねー？　灯織っ
trans:
Hahah～ Don't think you could get me that easily!
Riiight? Hiori!

name: 灯織
text:
そうだね、さっきは全然当たらなかった
けど──
trans:
You're right, I didn't even land a drop on you...
Buut──

name: めぐる
text: ひゃあっ？！
trans: Hyah?!

name: 灯織
text: ……油断大敵
trans: ...You just let your guard down.

name: めぐる
text: この～、やったなー！
trans: Why, you～! You've done it noow!

name: 真乃
text:
あっ、ふたりとも、そんなにお水かけたら
びしょびしょに──
trans:
Ah, at this rate,
you two are going to end up soaking wet──

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふっ
まぁ、今日くらいはいいよねっ
trans:
...Fufu.
Well, it should be fine... just for today.

name: 真乃
text: ──いくよっ、めぐるちゃん！
trans: ──Here I come, Meguru-chan!

name: めぐる
text: えぇっ、２対１ー！？
trans: Huh, 2 vs 1!?

name: めぐる
text:
はー楽しかった！
すっかり濡れちゃったねー
trans:
Phew～ That was fun!
We're all completely wet now～

name: 灯織
text:
……そろそろ上がって、
衣装のことスタッフさんに謝らないと
trans:
...We should hang these up to dry soon,
and apologize to the staff too.

name: 灯織
text: 必要以上に濡れちゃったし……
trans:
We got them a lot more wet than needed,
after all...

name: 真乃
text:
ほわ……うん、そうだね
楽しかったけどお仕事中だもんね
trans:
Howa... Yeah, you're right.
It was fun, but we're still in the middle of work.

name: めぐる
text: じゃあ、片付けてみんなでごめんなさいしに行こうっ
trans: Let's go clean up and apologize, then!

name: 真乃
text: うんっ
trans: Yep!

name: 真乃
text:
（……また、いつかふたりと……
こういうふうに遊べたら……いいな……！）
trans:
(...It would be great... If all of us could have fun
together again, just like this... someday...!

name: 真乃
text: ふふふっ
trans: Fufufu.
